data.actual_result: Current profile picture stays the same after upload and pressing save.
data.expected_result: Your new profile picture is supposed to be displayed and saved after uploading / pressing save.
data.short_description: Cannot change profile picture on Canary
data.steps_to_repro: - Open your settings - Press edit on your profile - upload new profile picture (tested only with gif as I'm ratelimited :^) ) - Your current profile picture will stay and pressing save won't change anything.
